author: Bill Gates
title: Investments
abtract: This is a summary of how Bill Gates started investing
body: I was a 10 year old when I started investing. And now I am a billionaire

author: Elon Musk
title: Space travel
abtract: I want humanity to live on Mars
body: Humanity is about to exhaust the natural resources on earth. It is time we went to Mars

author: Virat Kohli
title: IPL trophies
abtract: I want to win a title in IPL
body: Its been a lot of years and we haven't won a single trophy. Ee sala cup namde

author: Lionel Messi
title: Sack Bartomeu
abtract: It has been a disastrous season for Barcelona
body: Management has been poor. Good players have been sent away. And the legacy is perishing
